content: If the folders are bold, they contain unread emails. change the font to non bold by marking all mail in the folder as read.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: If you are being prompted for password, the one that Thunderbird has isn't working anymore. If you need a new password, you need to contact your email provider. If that is not the situation, then you need to provide more information. Thank you
creator: davidsk

content: If you need to reset the password, you should contact your email provider. Thunderbird will then store it for you.
creator: davidsk
